entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
